upgradeDescriptions.start: Switch to an unclean energy source to start producing emission.
upgradeDescriptions.clicker: Increases CO<sub>2</sub> emissions produced by clicking the button by #valx.
upgradeDescriptions.building_furnace: Increases CO<sub>2</sub> emissions produced by furnaces by #valx.
upgradeDescriptions.building_car: Increases CO<sub>2</sub> emissions produced by cars by #valx.
upgradeDescriptions.building_truck: Increases CO<sub>2</sub> emissions produced by trucks by #valx.
upgradeDescriptions.building_plane: Increases CO<sub>2</sub> emissions produced by airplanes by #valx.
upgradeDescriptions.building_factory: Increases CO<sub>2</sub> emissions produced by factories by #valx.
upgradeDescriptions.building_power_plant: Increases CO<sub>2</sub> emissions produced by power plants by #valx.
